title: Kevin Liles interview and more
itunes:title: Kevin Liles interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had record executive and co-founder and CEO of 300 Entertainment Kevin Liles stop by where he spoke about DMX, Artist Development, Publishing, Surviving The Industry and more. Also Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Army sergeant who was arrested for assaulting a young black kid and threatening him to leave the neighborhood, even though he lives lives there!!! Also Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee" with one listener trying to get out of a controlling relationship

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
